value:
$nMPID_ミカヤ|Has he gotten...taller? Odd I hadn't
noticed before now... Hm? Oh, don't
mind me. Just talking to myself.

$nMPID_サザ|No matter what comes, I will protect
Micaiah. And if she marries, I, um...

$nMPID_ミカヤ|This dress is like something out of
a dream! I can't believe I get to wear
it... What do you think?

$nMPID_サザ|Micaiah—look out! Your hem might
trip you as it is. Shall I cut it to your
usual length?

$nMPID_ミカヤ|This bouquet represents happiness.
Brides toss it at the end of weddings
to share their joy with others!

$nMPID_ミカヤ|I was sent to give you this by your
friend $Nf.

$nMPID_サザ|I will keep Micaiah safe.
Always, and forever.
$nMPID_ミカヤ|Is something wrong?

$nMPID_サザ|Fear not, I will be your shield.
I will not suffer even a finger
laid on Micaiah!

$nMPID_サザ|Thank you. I will use this to ensure
Micaiah's safety.

I am Micaiah and this is Sothe. We're
honored to have been invited to this
banquet. So let's have some fun, hm?

$nMPID_ミカヤ|Oh, Sothe, your collar is a mess...
Hold still a minute. There!$k$p...Is something the matter? You have
the same face you get when you've
been scolded by Yune.$k$p$nMPID_サザ|...$k$p...Can you smell it? Something
smells...nice.$k$p$nMPID_ミカヤ|Oh, you must be smelling
my flowers. The scent isn't
overpowering, is it?$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Oh, no. Besides, nothing is too
powerful to keep me from your
side, Micaiah.$k$p$nMPID_ミカヤ|Oh, Sothe... Thank you.
For everything.$k$pIf ever we're apart, know that in my
heart, we will always be together
like this.
やあっ
Does it suit me?
ああっ
So strong...
$nMPID_二人|I do.
$nMPID_二人|I want you by my side. I am.
Together forever!
$nMPID_サザ|Nothing can tear us apart!
I must protect...
Till death do us part...
Be safe.
I'm right here.

• "Take my hand."
• "Um...happily!"

• "So beautiful..."
• "You're very dapper."
Giggle

• "Strange, isn't it?"
• "A little..."
Certainly.
Let's go together.
Little nervous here...

$nMPID_ミカヤ|Sothe, wait... You're walking a little
fast. Sothe!
$nMPID_サザ|Sorry...

$nMPID_ミカヤ|I'm having a little trouble keeping up in
all these frills.

$nMPID_サザ|To be honest...all of this...
I'm a little lost.

$nMPID_ミカヤ|It's just a festival. There's no need to
get all worked up over it. All the same...
$nMPID_サザ|What is it?

$nMPID_ミカヤ|Seeing you dressed like this... It struck
me that I'm suddenly seeing you as the
man you've become.

When I look at you, I think, "He could
take care of someone. He could make
someone truly happy."

$nMPID_サザ|Micaiah, the only person I want to take
care of is you. If there's someone
I want to make happy...it's you.

$nMPID_ミカヤ|Don't say things like that unless you
really mean them.

$nMPID_サザ|But I do mean it. I'm just being
honest with you.
$nMPID_ミカヤ|No, I know you are... It's just...

$nMPID_サザ|I'll admit, I don't really understand why
people get married. But if that's what it
takes to stay by your side...
$nMPID_ミカヤ|Oh, Sothe. That's enough...
$nMPID_サザ|Micaiah?

$nMPID_ミカヤ|We WILL be together. For now and for
always. But getting married...that's not
something we can just...just do...

But maybe someday, when we're
ready...you can ask me again.$k$pWhen the time is right...I want to
hear you say those words.
